summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Letitia Avenue, from Rainier Avenue to the north line of Lot 6, Block 1, Montrose Addition, by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 8138 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
